MessageResponse.description:
Message Response DTO
Response object containing complete message information from the API

sessionId.description: Session ID this message belongs to

senderId.description: Sender/User ID who created this message

senderType.description: Type of sender: USER or BOT

metadata.description: Optional metadata associated with the message

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when message was last updated

Create Message DTO
Data transfer object for creating a new message in a session

sessionId.description: Session ID to which this message belongs (required)

senderId.description: Sender/User ID of the message author (required)

metadata.description: Optional metadata attached to the message

parameters.name: startDate
